nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are being packed today. Not open for skiing as we prepare trails.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is closed today as we focus on snowmaking. We will be open for skiing and riding December 6 and 7 from 9 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. for our first two days of the ski season. Thanks to the Nub's Nob Snow Farmers and some natural snow we should be in very good shape for this opening weekend. Stay tuned for more details including a run count over the next few days. See you on the slopes next weekend!
